headline: VICI Properties (VICI) Among the Best Affordable Stocks Under $40
summary: ​VICI Properties Inc. (NYSE:VICI) is among the Best Affordable Stocks Under $40 to Buy. Wall Street has a positive outlook on VICI as the company gets close to releasing its fiscal Q4 2025 earnings on February 25. Analysts’ 12-month price target reflects more than 19.45% upside from the current level, with 76% of the 25 […]
